fh-centers.name: FamilySearch Library
fh-centers.address: 35 North West Temple Street, Salt Lake City, UT 84150
fh-centers.description: World’s largest genealogical library with extensive records, microfilms, and digital resources.

fh-centers.name: National Archives at Washington, DC
fh-centers.description: Houses federal records, including census, military, and immigration documents.

fh-centers.name: Allen County Public Library Genealogy Center
fh-centers.description: Renowned for its Periodical Source Index and vast genealogical collections.

fh-centers.name: New England Historic Genealogical Society
fh-centers.description: Specializes in New England records, manuscripts, and international collections.

fh-centers.name: Library of Congress
fh-centers.description: Offers extensive genealogical resources, including newspapers and manuscripts.

fh-centers.name: California State Archives
fh-centers.description: Holds state records, including military, prison, and county documents.

fh-centers.name: New York Public Library
fh-centers.description: Features Milstein Division for genealogy, with New York-focused records.

fh-centers.name: National Archives at Atlanta
fh-centers.description: Stores federal records for southeastern states, including naturalization.

fh-centers.name: Midwest Genealogy Center
fh-centers.address: 3440 S. Lee’s Summit Road, Independence, MO 64055
fh-centers.description: Offers extensive U.S. and international genealogical resources and databases.

fh-centers.name: Center for Jewish History
fh-centers.description: Houses vast Jewish genealogical archives and reference collections.

fh-centers.name: Clayton Library Center for Genealogical Research
fh-centers.description: Specializes in Southern U.S. genealogy with microfilm and books.

fh-centers.name: National Archives at Chicago
fh-centers.description: Stores federal records for Midwest states, including naturalization.

fh-centers.name: Wisconsin Historical Society Library
fh-centers.description: Extensive Wisconsin and U.S. genealogy records, including newspapers.

fh-centers.name: Cincinnati & Hamilton County Public Library
fh-centers.description: Offers comprehensive genealogy resources for all U.S. states.

fh-centers.name: Sutro Library
fh-centers.description: Specializes in genealogy with rare books and family histories.

fh-centers.name: Detroit Public Library
fh-centers.description: Features census, vital records, and Michigan-specific genealogy collections.
